name: ufront-easyauth
description: A basic database based user-group-permission authentication system for ufront.
releasenote:
- Updates for new ufront-mvc, minject.
- Removed dependency on random and cleversort.
- No longer use a type parameter for UFAuthHandler.
- Allow EasyAuthApi to use a different AuthAdapter through dependency injection.
- Regenerate the sessionID after login. (security measure)
- Throw `tink.core.Error` objects rather than `AuthError`, so we get nice error messages.
